messages.text: Hi team, our API integration is returning 500 errors since this morning. Can someone help?
I'll investigate this right away. Can you share which endpoints are affected?
The /users/profile and /data/sync endpoints are both failing
Found the issue - we had a deployment that broke those endpoints. Rolling back now.
Fixed! All endpoints are working again. Sorry for the disruption.
Team, we're launching the new dashboard feature next week. Please test the beta version.
Looks great! The new analytics charts are much more intuitive.
Love the updated UI. The user flow is much smoother now.
How do I configure SSO for my organization?
I'll send you our SSO setup guide. You'll need admin access to configure SAML.
Perfect, thanks! This will help with our security compliance.
